title: Asac
description: Front-end of a vaction rental web application built in Typescript, React and Tailwind
blog_post: I created a rental website inspired by Airbnb, showcasing my skills in front-end design and development. Utilizing modern technologies, I designed an intuitive and aesthetically pleasing user interface where dynamic information retrieval for listings occurs in real-time on both the homepage and individual property pages. To enhance user experience, I incorporated an advanced search feature, allowing users to quickly and easily find their ideal rental. Additionally, by leveraging React Router, I developed a single-page application (SPA), ensuring smooth and fast navigation between different sections of the site. This project perfectly demonstrates my expertise in modern web development, combining efficiency, responsiveness, and elegant design.

title: Rénov à 9
description: Landing Page for renovation service, built in Typescript, React, Next.JS and Tailwind
blog_post: Creating the landing page for Renov a 9 was a meticulous and rewarding process, leveraging the power of modern web development technologies such as React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. The choice of React allowed us to build a highly interactive and dynamic user interface, ensuring that the page is responsive and efficient. Next.js was instrumental in providing a robust framework for server-side rendering and static site generation, which significantly improved the page's performance and SEO capabilities. Tailwind CSS was utilized to craft a visually appealing and highly customizable design, enabling rapid styling directly in the component files. Together, these technologies facilitated the creation of a sleek, functional, and user-friendly landing page that effectively showcases the renovation services offered by Renov a 9.

title: Sophie Buel
description: CRUD Application for Architecte, built in Javascript, HTML and SASS
blog_post: I implemented the Front-End and integrated data from an internally developed API using Node.js and Express.js. I worked on making API calls and manipulating the API to set up a robust authentication system, enabling the retrieval, creation, updating, and deletion of architectural works. Additionally, I designed and integrated advanced filtering functionalities and an intuitive modal to enhance the user experience. This experience strengthened my full-stack development skills, particularly in API management and web application security.
